name: Cyber Destroyer
description: Cyber destroyer is a 2D platformer game which is including pixel art and cartoon graphics. Game purpose is reaching to the end of the map with collecting golds and finding the last tree on the world. Player can kill robots with jumping on them. Game control buttons are W and A for going right or left and space button for jumping and double jumping. With a quicker double jump button, the player will be pushed with more force. In every death player is spawning to the beginning of the map.
